summary: A colour scheme inspired by Kellys bicycles
name: kellys
description:
A colour scheme inspired by Kellys bicycles: a dark background with quite intense colours, mainly blue, orange and green. Pretty good contrast, but not so much as to hurt the eyes.
A screenshot available at: http://img291.imageshack.us/my.php?image=vimkellys03fd0.png.
install_details: Place in your Vim colour schemes directory (probably ~/.vim/colors) for autoloading on startup and :source it or restart Vim, or just anywhere and :source it.

versions.release_notes:
finished ada, haskell, html, lisp, pascal, php, python, ruby, scheme, sh, xml and vim
changed preproc to slightly darker
changed statement to bold

added support for 256-colour terminal
added diff*, pmenu* and wildmenu
added some cpp, java*, python*, some sh and ruby*
removed italic from comments and made them slightly lighter
